member.name: T:AMLToolkit.Model.XmlElementExtension
member.summary: Class XmlElementExtension provides some Extension Methods to access CAEX Elements via an XmlElement. This Methods don't need a CAEXWrapper.

member.name: M:AMLToolkit.Model.XmlElementExtension.AllElements(System.Xml.XmlElement,System.String,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Alls the elements.
member.returns: IEnumerable<XmlElement>.

member.name: M:AMLToolkit.Model.XmlElementExtension.CAEXIDOfElement(System.Xml.XmlElement)
member.summary: Returns the CAEX ID of a the XmlElement if such an Attribute exists
member.returns: The Name or string.empty if the ID-Attribute is missing

member.name: M:AMLToolkit.Model.XmlElementExtension.CAEXNameOfElement(System.Xml.XmlElement)
member.summary: Returns the CAEX Name of a the XmlElement if such an Attribute exists
member.returns: The Name or string.empty if the Name-Attribute is missing

member.name: M:AMLToolkit.Model.XmlElementExtension.CAEXNameOfParent(System.Xml.XmlElement)
member.summary: Returns the CAEX Name of a parent XmlElement if such an Attribute exists
member.returns: The Name or string.empty if the Parent or the Name-Attribute is missing

member.name: M:AMLToolkit.Model.XmlElementExtension.RoleReferenceToMapping(System.Xml.XmlElement)
member.summary: Gets th RoleReference for a mapping.
member.returns: XmlElement.

member.name: M:AMLToolkit.Model.XmlElementExtension.SystemUnitClassReferenceToMapping(System.Xml.XmlElement)
member.summary: Gets the SystemUnitClass-Reference for a mapping.
member.returns: XmlElement.

member.name: M:AMLToolkit.Model.XmlElementExtension.CAEXPath(System.Xml.XmlElement)
member.summary: Returns the CAEX path of this object, search able with FindFastByID or FindFastByPath methods. Examples: "plant/unit/tank" or GUID:interface. If the full hierarchical Path is required, use the method HierarchyPath instead which delivers the full node path.
member.returns: For classes, it returns the XML full Node Path. For Interface Instances, it returns GUID:InterfaceName.

member.name: M:AMLToolkit.Model.XmlElementExtension.InternalLinkReferencePath(System.Xml.XmlElement,System.Xml.XmlElement)
member.summary: gets the reference path for an Interface-Reference in an InternalLink
member.returns: System.String.

member.name: M:AMLToolkit.Model.XmlElementExtension.PathPart(System.Xml.XmlElement,System.Boolean)
member.summary: transforms the name of the defined element to a path Part (special characters are escaped).
member.param: if set to true use the Elements ID, otherwise use its name.
member.returns: System.String.

member.name: M:AMLToolkit.Model.XmlElementExtension.PathPartName(System.String)
member.summary: transforms a name to a path Part (special characters are escaped).
member.returns: System.String.

member.name: M:AMLToolkit.Model.XmlElementExtension.ChildElements(System.Xml.XmlElement,System.String)
member.summary: get all child Elements of the specified element with the specified name.
member.returns: IEnumerable<XmlElement>.

member.name: M:AMLToolkit.Model.XmlElementExtension.CloneWhenNotDerived(System.Xml.XmlElement,System.Xml.XmlElement,System.String,System.String)
member.summary: The ChildElements in the specified 'baseElement', which have the defined ElementName are cloned, if there is not yet a child Element in the specified 'cloneElement' with that ElementName and an equal AttributeValue for the Attribute, specified with the 'AttributeName'.
member.returns: IEnumerable<XmlElement>.

member.name: M:AMLToolkit.Model.XmlElementExtension.GetAttributeValue(System.Xml.XmlElement,System.String)
member.summary: Gets the attribute value.
member.returns: System.String.

member.name: M:AMLToolkit.Model.XmlElementExtension.GetReferencedCAEXClassFromClassLibrary(System.Xml.XmlElement,System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Gets the referenced caex class from a class library, which is any of the Libraries with the defined LibraryTagName in the Document
member.param: The CAEX TagName of the Library.
member.returns: The referenced XmlNode, if it is found or null if not.

member.name: M:AMLToolkit.Model.XmlElementExtension.InternalElementReference(System.Xml.XmlElement)
member.summary: Get the InternalElementReferences if this is an InternalLink
member.returns: System.String.

member.name: M:AMLToolkit.Model.XmlElementExtension.InternalElementReferenceInInternalLink(System.Xml.XmlElement,System.String)
member.summary: Get the InternalElementReferences if this is an InternalLink

member.returns: System.String.

member.summary: Determines whether the specified elementWithDerivedAttributes has a child Element, which has the same ElementName and AttributeValue for the named Attribute as the specified elementWithAttribute
member.param: The element With Attribute which is tested for derivations.
member.returns: true if the specified attribute element is derived; otherwise, false.

member.name: M:AMLToolkit.Model.XmlNodeExtensions.CreateCAEXWrapper(System.Xml.XmlNode)
member.summary: creates CAEX object out of an XML node
member.returns: CAEXBasicObject

member.name: M:AMLToolkit.Model.XmlNodeExtensions.getFullNodePath(System.Xml.XmlNode)
member.summary: Getting the full path from document root to the specified XmlNode. As name of an XmlNode is the value of the contained attribute "name" taken. Hierarchies are separated via the path separator (slash '/'). The name of the document root element CAEXFile is not contained in the path.
member.param: The XmlNode to get the full path for
member.returns: The full path from the document root element to the given XmlNode. The path contains of values of the "name" attribute of the XmlNodes. If no such attribute exists in the current node, the xml tag name is used instead.

member.name: T:AMLToolkit.NamespaceDoc
member.summary: The AMLToolkit provides UI-Controls to view and edit AutomationML Content and some Templates for AutomationML Document creation and interpretation.

member.name: T:AMLToolkit.ViewModel.AMLLayout
member.summary: Class AMLLayout provides Properties which effect the display of AmlNodes

member.name: F:AMLToolkit.ViewModel.AMLLayout.DefaultLayout
member.summary: The default layout, which sets the visual properties of the layout to default values

member.name: M:AMLToolkit.ViewModel.AMLLayout.#cctor
member.summary: Initializes static members of the class. The Default behavior is, that all CAEX-Elements are visible.

member.name: P:AMLToolkit.ViewModel.AMLLayout.NamesOfVisibleElements
member.summary: Gets and sets the NamesOfVisibleElements. This Collection may be used as a filter to show/hide Elements with specific names. If the Collection contains a name, the Element gets visible. If the Name is removed from the collection, the element is hidden.

member.name: P:AMLToolkit.ViewModel.AMLLayout.ShowClassReference
member.summary: Gets and sets the ShowClassReference. Setting this Option to true, makes the ClassReference of an Element visible
member.value: true the ClassReference becomes visible and invisible if false.

member.name: P:AMLToolkit.ViewModel.AMLLayout.ShowRoleReference
member.summary: Gets and sets the ShowRoleReference. Setting this Option to true, makes the ClassReference of an Element visible
member.value: true the RoleReference becomes visible and invisible if false.

member.name: T:AMLToolkit.ViewModel.AMLNodeRegistry
member.summary:
Class AMLNodeRegistry defines a dictionary, containing CAEX-TagNames and associated ConstructionInfo for the CAEX-Element, identifiable by the CAEX-TagName. The Class implements the Singleton Pattern. The Static contains default ConstructionInfo for each CAEX-Element. The Default Dictionary Entries may be changed by an application, if a CAEX-Element has a special ViewModel with a special constructor. Currently, the following associations are created for the static Instance:
CAEX-Element Associated ViewModel-Constructor.>
InstanceHierarchy Basic ViewModel:
SystemUnitClassLibrary Basic ViewModel:
RoleClassLibrary Basic ViewModel:
InterfaceClassLibrary Basic ViewModel:
InternalLink Basic ViewModel:
InternalElement [has Class- and Role-Reference] Derived ViewModel:
SystemUnitClass [has Class-Reference] Derived ViewModel:
RoleClass [has Class-Reference] Derived ViewModel:
InterfaceClass [has Class-Reference] Derived ViewModel:
ExternalInterface [has Class-Reference] Derived ViewModel:
CaexFile [has no Name-Attribute] Derived ViewModel:
RoleRequirement [has no Name-Attribute] Derived ViewModel:
SupportedRoleClass [has no Name-Attribute] Derived ViewModel:
MappingObject [has no Name-Attribute] Derived ViewModel:
AttributeNameMapping [has no Name-Attribute] Derived ViewModel:
InterfaceNameMapping [has no Name-Attribute] Derived ViewModel:

member.name: M:AMLToolkit.ViewModel.AMLNodeRegistry.#ctor
member.summary: Prevents a default instance of the class from being created.

member.name: P:AMLToolkit.ViewModel.AMLNodeRegistry.Instance
member.summary: Gets the static instance of the AMLNodeRegistry

member.name: T:AMLToolkit.ViewModel.AMLNodeViewModel
member.summary: Class AMLNodeViewModel is the Base-ViewModel for CAEX-Elements in an AutomationML Document. The ViewModel supports LazyLoading. If a Node has not yet been expanded to view the Children, a DummyNode exists to mark the Node as a Node with Children. The DummyNode will be replaced by the Nodes Children, if it is expanded for the first time.

member.summary: The _is selected

member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.
member.param: if set to true [lazy load children].

member.name: M:AMLToolkit.ViewModel.AMLNodeViewModel.#ctor
member.summary: This is used to create the DummyChild instance. Prevents a default instance of the class from being created.

member.name: M:AMLToolkit.ViewModel.AMLNodeViewModel.RefreshNodeInformation(System.Boolean)
member.summary: Refreshes the node information. This Method can be overridden in derived classes. The Method should be called, if the CAEX-Elements Data has changed and the Changes should be visible in any View, that has a binding to this ViewModel.

member.name: M:AMLToolkit.ViewModel.AMLNodeViewModel.ApplyFilterWithName(System.Collections.Generic.IList{System.String})
member.summary: Applies the Name filter to the . This Method is called, when the of the associated Layout Object changes. The Method is put on the current Dispatcher Thread for asynchronous execution. The Method ic recursively called for all Children's, that pass the Filter.

member.name: M:AMLToolkit.ViewModel.AMLNodeViewModel.LoadChildren
member.summary: Invoked when the child items need to be loaded on demand. Subclasses can override this to populate the Children collection.

member.summary: Test, if the can execute.
member.returns: true, if command can execute

member.summary: The Execution Action.

member.summary: Gets the CAEXNode

member.summary: Gets and sets the List of CAEXTagNames for valid child's, which are loaded to the TreeView. If this is not set for a Node, the List of the actual parent is used.
member.value: The name of the caex tag.

member.name: P:AMLToolkit.ViewModel.AMLNodeViewModel.Children
member.summary: Returns the logical child items of this object.

member.name: P:AMLToolkit.ViewModel.AMLNodeViewModel.ChildrenView
member.summary: Gets the children view. Binding to this Property enables filtering and ordering of the Children Collection

member.name: P:AMLToolkit.ViewModel.AMLNodeViewModel.ExpandAllCommand
member.summary: The ExpandAllCommand - Command. Execution of this Command results in the Expansion of the Node and all it's descendants. The Execution method is queued on the current Dispatcher Thread for asynchronous Execution.

member.summary: Returns true if this object's Children have not yet been populated.
member.value: true if this instance has dummy child; otherwise, false.

member.summary: Gets/sets whether the TreeViewItem associated with this object is expanded.
member.value: true if this instance is expanded; otherwise, false.

member.name: P:AMLToolkit.ViewModel.AMLNodeViewModel.IsSelected
member.summary: Gets/sets whether the TreeViewItem associated with this object is selected.
member.value: true if this instance is selected; otherwise, false.

member.name: T:AMLToolkit.ViewModel.AMLNodeWithClassAndRoleReference
member.summary: Class AMLNodeWithClassAndRoleReference is the ViewModel for all CAEX-Elements, which may have references to CAEX-Classes and Roles. The ViewModel provides an additional property for these Elements. The RoleReference is build from the first RoleRequirement found in the Children Collection of the Element.

member.name: T:AMLToolkit.ViewModel.AMLTreeViewTemplate
member.summary: Class AMLTreeViewTemplate defines default TreeViewTemplates for CAEX-Elements, that can be displayed in a TreeView. If a TreeView is build with one of the defined Templates, it is still possible to configure the TreeView, using a Node-Filter.

member.name: T:AMLToolkit.XamlClasses.BooleanOrToVisibilityConverter
member.summary: Class BooleanOrToVisibilityConverter converts an array of boolean values to if at least one of the values is true.

member.name: M:AMLToolkit.XamlClasses.BooleanOrToVisibilityConverter.Convert(System.Object[],System.Type,System.Object,System.Globalization.CultureInfo)
member.summary: Konvertiert Quellwerte in einen Wert fr das Bindungsziel.Das Datenbindungsmodul ruft diese Methode auf, wenn es Werte aus den Quellbindungen an das Bindungsziel weitergibt.
member.param: Der Wertearray, den die Quellbindungen in dem erzeugen.Der Wert gibt an, dass die Quellbindung keinen Wert fr die Konvertierung bereitstellen kann.
Die im Konverter zu verwendende Kultur.
member.returns: Ein konvertierter Wert.Wenn die Methode null zurckgibt, wird der gltige null-Wert verwendet.Der Rckgabewert . gibt an, dass der Konverter keinen Wert erstellt und dass die Bindung den verwendet, falls vorhanden, oder andernfalls den Standardwert.Der Rckgabewert . gibt an, dass die Bindung den Wert nicht bertrgt oder den oder den Standardwert verwendet.

member.name: M:AMLToolkit.XamlClasses.BooleanOrToVisibilityConverter.ConvertBack(System.Object,System.Type[],System.Object,System.Globalization.CultureInfo)
member.summary: Konvertiert einen Bindungsziel-Wert in Werte fr die Quellbindung.
member.param: Der Wert, den das Bindungsziel erzeugt.
Das Array der Typen, in die konvertiert werden soll.Die Arraylnge gibt die Anzahl und die Typen der Werte an, die der Methode fr die Rckgabe vorgeschlagen werden.
Die im Konverter zu verwendende Kultur.
member.returns: Ein Array von Werten, die aus dem Zielwert in die Quellwerte zurckkonvertiert wurden.
